summary: The story of this political thriller takes place in the 90s and follows one night of the life of the Deputy Minister Nikola and his wife Ana. Nikola Ristanovski and Verica Nedeska star in the main roles of the couple.
cast: Nikola Ristanovski|Verica Nedeska|Igor Angelov|Boris Damovski|Nina Jankovic|Sabina Ajrula|Saska Dimitrovska|Marija Novak|Strezo Stamatovski|Kiril Gravcev|Vesna Stanojevska|Refet Abazi|Mitko Apostolovski|Branko Beninov|Ankica Beninova|Gorast Cvetkovski|Dimitrija Doksevski|Krystof Hádek|Dime Ilijev|Ljupco Karov|Sasko Kocev|Dragana Levenska|Aleksandar Mikic|Dragana Bosnic Milenkovska|Tony Naumovski|Aleksandra Pesevska|Jitka Schneiderová|Sabedin Selmani|Georgi M. Unkovski
keywords: remake of czech film|north macedonian remake|north macedonian remake of czech film|foreign language adaptation|husband wife conflict
title: Honey Night
